medium: Color screenprint, lithograph, oil paint, and collage
title: Angel and Boy
marks: Signed, dated, numbered LR: [Nicolas Africano 1986]; LL: [Working Proof (A
description: Two nude figures; a boy on L next to a celestial figure with wings and a halo on R; boy is crouched over; his body illuminated by a haze of bright color; predominant colors: green, blue, peach and gold
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
